body:
Comment 3 by **erik.westrup**: 
Oh sorry. I've tried both 

GNU gdb (GDB) 7.4.1-debian

and compiled from sauce

GNU gdb (GDB) 7.7


Aside) I think the docs http://golang.org/doc/gdb should mention that (at least GDB 7.7)
disables auto-loading of scripts so you need to invoke it like

$ gdb -q -iex "set auto-load safe-path $GOROOT" ./prog
or set that in ~/.gdbinit.
